Hello, I'm Lindsey.

I'm a product designer who likes making web sites and apps easier to use. Coffee lover, curry enthusiast, and future crazy cat lady living in Cleveland.

I like code, design, books, cats, board games, video games, and nerdy TV. Feel free to get in touch with me, I'm always open to meeting and talking with new people.

“Real web designers write code. Always have, always will.” ‐ Jeffrey Zeldman
